title: Licenses of three fuel trucks suspended for illegally unloading fuel
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Power & Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekera said that the licenses of three fuel trucks have been suspended with immediate effect by the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation and Lanka IOC.
He said investigations are underway in to three individual incidents reported on social media of fuel transporting trucks illegally unloading fuel.
Licenses of three fuel trucks suspended for illegally unloading fuel
